name: The Rose Processor
description:
The Rose Processor is a game developed during Ludum Dare 31.

You have to create a rose by converting white petals into red ones. The red ones can be manipulated by using the mouse wheel or the up and down arrows.

Mouse wheel (or up and down arrows) to change the positions of the red petals.
1, 2, 3 and 4 to change the series of petals you wish to control.
